title: Distill
description: A modern medium for presenting research in ML with clarity and visualizations.
longDescription: Distill is dedicated to clear explanations of machine learning. By combining interactive diagrams, thoughtful design, and a strong emphasis on clarity, Distill is an excellent resource for those who want to dive deep into ML concepts. The articles often cover cutting-edge research, but are presented in a more accessible, intuitive format.

title: Andrej Karpathy's Blog
description: Personal blog by Andrej Karpathy, covering deep learning, AI, and more.
longDescription: Andrej Karpathy, a prominent figure in the deep learning community, writes about neural networks, AI trends, self-driving cars, and occasionally personal reflections on technology. His blog offers insights into both the technical and philosophical aspects of AI development.
